assignments.name: asn_AccountIDToSourceContact
assignments.label: Assign the AccountID to the Contact

assignments.description: ... assign the Account Name to the Business Account after the recordType is created.
assignments.name: asn_AccountNameToBusinessAccount
assignments.label: Assign the Account Name to the Business Account

assignments.description: ... assign the B2C Account Properties to the Contact's parent Account (Name and RecordTypeId).
assignments.name: asn_B2CAccountRecordType
assignments.label: Assign the B2C Account Properties

assignments.description: ... assign the customerList value (whatever it is) to the source Contact.
assignments.name: asn_B2CCustomerListIDToSourceContact
assignments.label: Assign the B2C CustomerList ID Value

assignments.description: ... ensure that the sourceContact has a well defined B2C CustomerList relationship.
assignments.name: asn_B2CCustomerListRelationship_Update
assignments.label: Assign the B2C CustomerList Relationship

assignments.description: ... assign the retrieved B2C CustomerList to a local variable for future use.
assignments.name: asn_b2cCustomerListToLocalVariable_create
assignments.label: Assign the CustomerList to a Local Variable

assignments.description: ... assign the B2C CustomerList to a local variable for future processing.
assignments.name: asn_b2cCustomerListToLocalVariable_Update
assignments.label: Assign the B2C CustomerList to a Local Variable

assignments.description: ... assign the specified customerList to the sourceContact record. This is done to facilitate the assignment to the resolvedContact record.
assignments.name: asn_B2CCustomerListToResolvedContact
assignments.label: Assign B2C CustomerList ID to sourceContact

assignments.description: ... alert the user that updates cannot be made without identifiers being provided.
assignments.name: asn_cannotUpdateWithoutIdentifiers
assignments.label: Error: Cannot Update Without Identifiers

value.stringValue: Successfully resolved a record but could not process an update. Please include at least one set of identifiers to update this record.

assignments.description: ... set the output variables for the successful processing of the sourceContact record.
assignments.name: asn_contactProcessSuccessfully_Update
assignments.label: Contact Processed Successfully

assignments.description: ... create a reference to the sourceContact before it is modified.
assignments.name: asn_createOriginalContact
assignments.label: Create the Original Contact

assignments.description: ... create the originalContact for comparative purposes later in the flow.
assignments.name: asn_createOriginalContact_ContactID
assignments.label: Create the Original Contact

assignments.description: ... throw an error explaining the Contact does not have a parent Account.
assignments.name: asn_ErrorCannotUpdateContact_Assignment
assignments.label: Error: Contact Missing Parent Account

value.stringValue: This Contact does not have a valid parent Account. Please check the Id value and try again.

assignments.description: ... throw an error that Contact Integration is disabled.
assignments.name: asn_ErrorContactIntegrationDisabled_Assignment
assignments.label: Error: Contact Integration Disabled

value.stringValue: B2C Commerce Integration is disabled for this Contact. Please check the Contact record and try again.

assignments.description: ... throw an error explaining the Contact's attributes must include a LastName if a CustomerList / CustomerNo are not provided.
assignments.name: asn_ErrorContactLastNameMissing_Assignment
assignments.label: Error: Contact LastName is Missing

value.stringValue: Please specify a LastName for the Contact being processed. LastName can only be omitted if an Email Address or B2C CustomerList / CustomerNo combination is included with the Contact.

assignments.description: ... throw an error that the Contact record associated to the ID was not found.
assignments.name: asn_ErrorContactNotFound_Assignment
assignments.label: Error: Contact Record Not Found

value.stringValue: No Contact was found with the ContactID specified in this request; please verify the Id value and try again.

assignments.description: ... throw an error that integration is disabled for this CustomerList or B2C Instance.
assignments.name: asn_ErrorIntegrationIsDisabled
assignments.label: Error: Integration Is Disabled

value.stringValue: Integration for this combination of parameters is disabled. Please check the environment configuration and try again.

assignments.description: ... throw an error that integration is disabled for this CustomerList or B2C Instance.
assignments.name: asn_ErrorIntegrationIsDisabled_0
assignments.label: Error: Integration Is Disabled

value.stringValue: B2C Commerce Integration is Disabled for this B2C Instance or CustomerList. Please check the Salesforce Org configuration.

assignments.description: ... throw an error explaining that multiple Contacts were resolved.
assignments.name: asn_ErrorMultipleContactsResolved_Assignment
assignments.label: Error: Multiple Contacts Resolved

assignments.description: ... throw an error that no B2C CustomerList ID was provided.
assignments.name: asn_ErrorNoCustomerListProvided
assignments.label: Error: No B2C CustomerList ID Provided

value.stringValue: A B2C Commerce CustomerList ID is required for Contact Resolution with non Salesforce Platform identifiers. Please include a B2C CustomerList ID and try again.

assignments.description: ... throw an error that this service can only process B2C Contact Profiles (which require a CustomerList).
assignments.name: asn_ErrorOnlyProcessB2CContacts_Assignment
assignments.label: Error: Only Process B2C Contact Profiles

value.stringValue: Only Contacts with a B2C CustomerList can be processed. Please provide a B2C CustomerList value and try again.

assignments.description: .. overwrite the sourceContact record with the QA Value(s).
assignments.name: asn_overwriteSourceContact
assignments.label: Overwrite the Source Contact

assignments.description: ... assign the parent B2C Commerce Account to the Contact
assignments.name: asn_parentB2CAccount
assignments.label: Assign the Parent Account to the Contact

assignments.description: ... assign the test properties of the QA Contact to overwrite the sourceContact.
assignments.name: asn_qaContactProperties
assignments.label: Assign the QA Contact Properties

assignments.description: ... set the success flag and announce that the Contact Processing was successful
assignments.name: ContactCreateSuccess_Assignment
assignments.label: Contact Processed Successfully Assignment

decisions.description: ... evaluate if we can resolve the Contact record using the identifiers provided.
decisions.name: dec_CanWeResolveThisContact
decisions.label: Was a Contact Resolved?

decisions.description: ... evaluate if a B2C CustomerList relationship already exists on the sourceContact.
decisions.name: dec_doesB2CCustomerListRelationshipExist
decisions.label: Does a B2C CustomerList Relationship Exist?

decisions.description: ... evaluate if a Contact has a lastName assigned -- and prevent saving of the Account / Contact records if one is not provided.
decisions.name: dec_doesContactHaveLastName
decisions.label: Does the Contact Have a LastName Assigned?

decisions.description: ... evaluates the Contact Record to determine if it can be processed.
decisions.name: dec_EvaluateContactRecord
decisions.label: Evaluate the Contact Record

decisions.description: ... evaluate if the B2C CustomerID is valid and well-formed.
decisions.name: dec_isB2CCustomerIDValid
decisions.label: Was the B2C CustomerID Valid?

decisions.description: ... evaluate if the ContactID value provided is valid
decisions.name: dec_isContactIDValid
decisions.label: Is the ContactID Valid?

decisions.description: ... evaluates the integration configuration validation results -- and either moves forward with the integration event or stops event processing.
decisions.name: dec_isIntegrationEnabledForPlatformEvent
decisions.label: Is Integration Enabled for this Event?

decisions.description: ... evaluates the integration configuration validation results -- and either moves forward with the integration event or stops event processing.
decisions.name: dec_isIntegrationEnabledForPlatformEvent_0
decisions.label: Is Integration Enabled for this Event?

decisions.description: ... evaluate if QA Mode is enabled -- and act accordingly.
decisions.name: dec_isQAModeEnabled
decisions.label: Is QA Mode Enabled?

decisions.description: ... check the originalContact and evaluate if at least one set of identifiers was included.
decisions.name: dec_isTrustworthyIDPresentInOriginalContact
decisions.label: Is An ID Present in the originalContact?

decisions.description: ... retrieve the configured customerModel to leverage when synchronizing B2C Commerce Customer Profiles.
decisions.name: dec_RetrieveCustomerModel
decisions.label: Retrieve the Customer Model

decisions.description: ... evaluate if a B2C CustomerID was specified on the sourceContact
decisions.name: dec_wasB2CCustomerIDSpecified
decisions.label: Was a B2C CustomerID set?

decisions.description: ... evaluate if a B2C Commerce CustomerList was found on the verified Contact record.
decisions.name: dec_wasB2CCustomerListFound_ContactID_0
decisions.label: Was a B2C CustomerList Found?

decisions.description: ... evaluate if a B2C Commerce CustomerList was provided; do not allow Contact Processing to continue if a CustomerList was not provided.
decisions.name: dec_wasB2CCustomerListProvidedAndThrowError
decisions.label: Throw an Error if No CustomerList Exists?

decisions.description: ... evaluate if a ContactID was included with the sourceContact definition.
decisions.name: dec_wasContactIDSet
decisions.label: Was a ContactID Set?

decisions.description: ... validate that the sourceContact record exists -- or throw an error message indicating otherwise.
decisions.name: dec_wasSourceContactRecordVerified
decisions.label: Was the Source Record Verified?

Flow.description: ... this flow is used to execute Contact Processing requests from B2C Commerce -- and evaluate if a Contact record should be created or updated within the Salesforce Platform.
Flow.interviewLabel: B2C Commerce: Create Or Update Contact {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: B2C Commerce: Process: Create Or Update Contact

recordCreates.description: ... create the Contact Record for the B2C Business Account
recordCreates.name: recCreate_BusinessRecord_Create
recordCreates.label: Create B2C Business Contact Record

recordCreates.description: ... create the Parent B2C Account so that we can attach the Contact record to it.
recordCreates.name: recCreate_ParentB2CAccount
recordCreates.label: Create the Parent Account

recordLookups.description: ... retrieve the parent Account record for the output
recordLookups.name: recGet_Account
recordLookups.label: Retrieve the Parent Account

recordLookups.description: ... retrieve the recordType describing B2C Customer Profiles so it can be added to the Account.
recordLookups.name: recGet_B2CRecordType
recordLookups.label: Get the B2C Business Account RecordType

recordLookups.description: ... retrieve the Contact record by the B2C CustomerID to validate the CustomerList relationship
recordLookups.name: recGet_ContactByB2CCustomerID
recordLookups.label: Retrieve the Contact by B2C Customer ID

recordLookups.description: ... retrieves the customerList based on the property value included in the Contact Request.
recordLookups.name: recGet_creCustomerList
recordLookups.label: Retrieve the CustomerList

recordLookups.description: ... retrieve the defaultConfiguration for the current b2c-crm-sync instance.
recordLookups.name: recGet_defaultConfiguration
recordLookups.label: Get the Default Configuration

recordLookups.description: ... identify which b2c-crm-sync configuration profile is being used as the default.
recordLookups.name: recGet_IdentifyDefaultConfiguration
recordLookups.label: Identify the Default Configuration

recordLookups.description: ... retrieve the B2C CustomerList for the updateContact process.
recordLookups.name: recGet_updCustomerList
recordLookups.label: Retrieve the B2C CustomerList

recordLookups.description: ... attempt to retrieve the sourceContact record leveraging the identifier provided.
recordLookups.name: recGet_validateSourceContactRecord
recordLookups.label: Retrieve the Contact Record

recordUpdates.description: ... update the recordType on the Account to convert it to a PersonAccount.
recordUpdates.name: recUpd_PersonAccountRecordType
recordUpdates.label: Update the RecordType on the Account

subflows.description: ... assign the required resolvedContact properties to the sourceContact where those properties are not automatically included in the sourceContact definition. Only assign properties where they do not exist.
subflows.name: asn_resolvedContactPropertiesToSourceContact
subflows.label: Assign Resolved Contact Properties to Source Contact

subflows.description: ... assign the sourceContact integration properties from the resolvedContact where they have not already been set.
subflows.name: asn_sourceContactIntegrationPropertiesResolvedContact
subflows.label: Assign sourceContact Integration Properties from Resolved Contact

subflows.description: ... evaluate the configuration of the specified CustomerList and sourceContact to determine if integration should be enabled.
subflows.name: sub_allowIntegrationHelper_NoContactID
subflows.label: Evaluate Integration Configuration

subflows.description: ... evaluate the configuration of the specified CustomerList and sourceContact to determine if integration should be enabled.
subflows.name: sub_allowIntegrationHelper_NoContactID_0
subflows.label: Allow Integration for this Source Contact?

subflows.description: ... this flow is used to take Contact properties from the sourceContact presented to this flow -- and assign them to the output Contact that will be returned in the flow results.
subflows.name: sub_B2CCommerceContactAssignmentHelper
subflows.label: Assign Source Contact Properties

subflows.description: ... attempt to calculate the Account Name based on the Contact properties provided.
subflows.name: sub_calculateAccountName
subflows.label: Calculate the Account Name

subflows.description: ... generate the Contact Process Platform Event.
subflows.name: sub_contactProcessPlatformEventHelper
subflows.label: Create the Contact Process Platform Event

subflows.description: ... generate the Contact Process Platform Event.
subflows.name: sub_contactProcessPlatformEventHelper_Update
subflows.label: Create the Contact Process Platform Event

subflows.description: ... leverage the Contact Resolution Helper to attempt to resolve the sourceContact.
subflows.name: sub_contactResolutionHelper
subflows.label: Attempt to Resolve the Contact

variables.description: ... represents the resolved Contact Record via non-ContactID means
variables.name: Contact

variables.description: ... represents the collection containing the Contact to resolve
variables.name: contactToResolve

variables.description: ... represents the input parameters used to process a Contact record.
variables.name: sourceContact

variables.description: ... represents the name applied to the B2C Commerce Account.
variables.name: var_accountName

variables.description: ... variable used to store the B2C CustomerList details that other elements of this flow are dependent on.
variables.name: var_b2cCustomerList

variables.description: ... represents the error message provided by the contactResolutionHelper.
variables.name: var_contactResolutionError

variables.description: ... represents the successFlag value from the contactResolution class.
variables.name: var_contactResolutionSuccess

variables.description: ... represents the iterative count of resolvedContact items
variables.name: var_loopResolvedContactIterationCount

variables.description: ... represents the original version of the sourceContact.
variables.name: var_originalContact

variables.description: ... describes if the current flow is operating in QAMode
variables.name: var_qaMode

variables.description: ... represents the contactRecord used to overwrite the sourceContact for QA testing.
variables.name: var_qaSourceContact

variables.description: ... represents the resolvedContact provided by the contactResolutionHelper.
variables.name: var_resolvedContact

variables.description: ... used to capture the number of contacts resolved by the B2C CustomerResolution IA.
variables.name: var_resolvedContactCount
